headline.main: MACHINE TOOLS TOP SOVIET WANTS HERE; Equipment for Use in New Plants in Interior First on List, Exporters Report

lead_paragraph: Machine tools, presumably for use in new munitions and supply plants to be constructed deep in Russia's interior and away from Nazi bombers, are the No. 1 item on Soviet Russia's requisition list turned in to American authorities last week, according to information obtained here yesterday from exporters who maintain close business contacts with the Soviet.
abstract: U S exporters comment on machine tool and other USSR needs; Amtorg Trading Corp designated wartime buying agent; ship shortage effect discussed
